definition: (to play) one's part/one's role/one's duty/(to stay within) one's bounds/dutiful/keeping to one's role
root/stem/origin/source/this/the current/original/inherent/originally/classifier for books, periodicals, files etc

to divide/to separate/to distribute/to allocate/to distinguish (good and bad)/part or subdivision/fraction/one tenth (of certain units)/unit of length equivalent to 0.33 cm/minute (unit of time)/minute (angular measurement unit)/a point (in sports or games)/0.01 yuan (unit of money)

sentences.english: Therefore this sub-item would be taken up at a later meeting.
sentences.chinese: 因此，本分項目將在以後的一次會議上繼續審議。

sentences.english: Had done, it is its devoir.
Stay here for the night, and in the morning if he wants to redeem, good; let him redeem.
sentences.chinese: 你今夜在這裏住宿，明早他若肯爲你盡親屬的本分。

sentences.english: What is the duty of those who have been baptised?
sentences.chinese: 領過洗的人有什麼本分？

sentences.english: By feeling that I was doing my duty.
sentences.chinese: 我覺得我在盡我的本分。

sentences.english: "Devoir" in French mean must have or duty.
sentences.chinese: “本分”在法語中的意思必須擁有或義務。

sentences.english: Every student ought to do his part to make steady progress.
sentences.chinese: 每個學生都應盡本分以求平穩的進步。

sentences.english: We come together and do what’s required to make tomorrow better than today.
sentences.chinese: 我們走到一起，盡我們的本分，使明天比今天更美好。

sentences.english: Happy is he who only desires what he may and does what he ought.
sentences.chinese: 不作非分之想又能盡其本分的人是快樂的。

sentences.english: Don't believe this world's girl real duty of man.
sentences.chinese: 女孩子不要相信這個世界上有老實本分的男人。

sentences.english: Tarry this night, and it shall be in the morning, that if he will perform unto thee the part of a kinsman, well;
sentences.chinese: 你今夜在這裏住宿，明早他若肯爲你盡親屬的本分。

sentences.english: Punishing corruption is the right of ours entrusted by peoples.
sentences.chinese: 懲治腐敗是我們的本分。

sentences.english: God is like the sub-tease people.
To serve the people is our duty.
sentences.chinese: 爲人民服務是我們的本分。

sentences.english: They would support God's house and do what they should in providing for it.
sentences.chinese: 他們會克盡本分地作出奉獻，藉此支持神的殿。

sentences.english: But if, the school allocates him devoir a bit, the life is stable.
sentences.chinese: 但是學校分配自己要是本分一點，生活是穩定的。

definition: to be content with one's lot (idiom)/to know one's place
making an all-out effort (idiom); to try one's heart out/to do one's utmost
to do one's duty/to do one's bit conscientiously
to be of service to others/to help others/benevolent
to conduct oneself/to behave with integrity
